citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
15-SEP-16.
* Inspector knocked on front door to the house of the licensee. Licensee stated she had a prior scheduled
appointment and was just leaving the residence.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
15-SEP-16.
*  Inspector knocked on front door to the house of the licensee.  Licensee stated she had a prior scheduled
appointment and was just leaving the residence.    
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
